title: Scourge of the Corruptor
summaries: The Scourge of the Corruptor is a Hardmode, post-Plantera melee weapon that autofires an Eater's Bite, a high-velocity javelin head that looks like a small Eater of Souls, which then splits into 2–4 or 15 (see Notes)(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 2–5(Old-gen console and 3DS versions) Tiny Eaters upon impact with a solid block or enemy. These smaller projectiles have homing capabilities, can travel approximately 350 tiles, and ricochet up to five times before dissipating. Both the Eater's Bite and Tiny Eaters are unaffected by gravity. The Scourge of the Corruptor is always found in the Dungeon's Corruption Chest, which can only be unlocked with a Corruption Key after Plantera has been defeated.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Damage: 70 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 64 (Old-gen console version) / 57 (3DS version) (Melee)
statistics.Tooltip: A powerful javelin that unleashes tiny eaters
